typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStartTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionLineItemCompletedTimestamp as timestamp,
		ProductId as integer,
		ItemSku as string,
		UniversalProductCode as decimal(10,0),
		Quantity as decimal(10,0),
		UnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		PreorderIndicator as integer,
		ProductListPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionProductPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		FreeSampleIndicator as boolean,
		TotalTransactionLineItemAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineEntryMethodId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemScanTimestamp as timestamp,
		PosDeviceId as integer,
		ScaleUsedIndicator as boolean,
		ScaleMeasuredItemWeight as integer,
		WeightUomId as integer,
		ScaleQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionLineVolume as decimal(10,0),
		VolumeUomId as integer,
		ProductPriceOverrideIndicator as boolean,
		ProductPriceAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ProductPriceAdjustmentPercentage as decimal(10,0),
		TotalLineItemAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		LineItemNote as string,
		QuantityBooked as integer,
		QuantityBilled as integer,
		QuantityBacklog as integer,
		AcceptedQuantity as decimal(10,0),
		QuantityCancelled as integer,
		QuantityReturned as integer,
		BookedTimestamp as timestamp,
		BilledTimestamp as timestamp,
		CancelledTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnedTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		RequestedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		CommittedAvailableForPickupTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualPickTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualShipmentTimestamp as timestamp,
		PlannedDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		ActualDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		ShipmentChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShipmentCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		PickPackageCostAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShippingLocationId as integer,
		ShipmentMethodId as integer,
		DropShipLineItemIndicator as boolean,
		WaybillNumber as integer,
		TareWeight as integer,
		NetWeight as integer,
		ShipCompleteIndicator as boolean,
		EarliestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		LatestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		ReturnTransactionId as integer,
		ReturnTransactionLineItemId as integer,
		ReturnToStockIndicator as boolean,
		ReturnToStoreIndicator as boolean,
		ApprovedByEmployeeId as integer,
		SalesChannelId as integer,
		DistributionChannelId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemTypeId as integer,
		TransactionLineItemStatusId as integer,
		FuelPumpId as integer,
		BuyClassId as integer,
		PromotionId as integer,
		PharmacyId as integer,
		PharmacyTransactionId as integer,
		PromotionOfferId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	modifiedAfter: (addDays(currentUTC(), -180)),
	modifiedBefore: ($modifiedBefore),
	entity: 'TransactionLineItem.cdm.json/TransactionLineItem',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'TransactionLineItem',
	corpusPath: 'corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'sourcemodel',
	folderPath: 'SourceFolder/TransactionLineItem',
	fileSystem: 'sourcemodel') ~> TransactionLineItemDeltaSource
source(output(
		TransactionId as integer,
		TransactionInitiatedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionCompletedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionReceivedTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionEntryTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		CreditCheckTimestamp as timestamp,
		RequestedDeliveryDate as date,
		CommittedDeliveryDate as date,
		ActualDeliveryTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryConfirmationTimestamp as timestamp,
		TransactionAmount as decimal(10,0),
		ShipmentToName as string,
		ShipmentToLocationId as integer,
		TransactionConfirmationNumber as string,
		IdentificationCheckedIndicator as boolean,
		IdentificationId as integer,
		TotalRetailPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalAdjustmentPercentage as decimal(10,0),
		TotalAdjustmentAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalTransactionSalesPriceAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalShippingChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionTotalTaxAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionRoundingAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TransactionTotalInvoicedAmount as decimal(10,0),
		TotalCommissionsPayableAmount as decimal(10,0),
		SplitCommissionsIndicator as boolean,
		RequestedShipmentCarrierName as string,
		AlternateCarrierAcceptableIndicator as boolean,
		ShipCompleteIndicator as boolean,
		AcknowledgementRequiredIndicator as boolean,
		ExpediteTransactionIndicator as boolean,
		DropShipmentIndicator as boolean,
		ActualShipmentCarrierName as string,
		TotalWeight as integer,
		TotalFreightChargeAmount as decimal(10,0),
		UnitOfMeasureId as integer,
		EarliestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		LatestDeliveryWindowTimestamp as timestamp,
		DeliveryInstructions as string,
		CustomerCreditCheckNote as string,
		MessageToCustomer as string,
		CustomerId as integer,
		CustomerAccountId as integer,
		PurchasingChannelId as integer,
		SalesChannelId as integer,
		DistributionChannelId as integer,
		MarketingEventId as integer,
		AdvertisingEventId as integer,
		PromotionId as integer,
		TransactionTypeId as integer,
		BillingCycleId as integer,
		MerchantId as integer,
		CustomerIdentificationMethodId as integer,
		TransactionClassificationId as integer,
		TransactionProcessingStatusId as integer,
		IsoCurrencyCode as string,
		TransactionExecutionMethodId as integer,
		TransactionPriorityId as integer,
		TransactionTaxStatusId as integer,
		WebPageUrl as string,
		SessionId as integer,
		PointOfSaleId as integer,
		StoreId as integer,
		WarehouseId as integer,
		ResponsibilityCenterId as integer,
		TransactionNote as string,
		ShipmentMethodId as integer,
		DeviceId as integer,
		SoftwareProductId as integer,
		SoftwareProductVersionNumber as integer,
		ApprovedByEmployeeId as integer,
		PromotionOfferId as integer,
		LoyaltyCardId as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	entity: 'Transaction.cdm.json/Transaction',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'Transaction',
	corpusPath: 'corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'sourcemodel',
	folderPath: 'SourceFolder/Transaction',
	fileSystem: 'sourcemodel') ~> TransactionSource
TransactionLineItemDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		TransactionLineItemId,
		ProductId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> TransactionLineItem
TransactionSource select(mapColumn(
		TransactionId,
		CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Transaction
TransactionLineItem, Transaction join(TransactionLineItem@TransactionId == Transaction@TransactionId,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinTransaction
joinTransaction aggregate(groupBy(CustomerId,
		ProductId),
	PurchaseCount = count(TransactionLineItemId)) ~> aggregatedTransactionLineItem
aggregatedTransactionLineItem select(mapColumn(
		CustomerId,
		ProductId,
		PurchaseCount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerProductInsight
CustomerProductInsight sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	entity: 'CustomerProductInsight.cdm.json/CustomerProductInsight',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	manifestName: 'CustomerProductInsight',
	folderPath: 'targetdata/CustomerProductInsight',
	fileSystem: 'demotarget2',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: 'corpus',
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: 'demotarget2',
	truncate: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CustomerProductInsightSink
